author: Brandon Laney
comment: I used to use this app all the time when it was a few days before payday and hungry. I would be able to charge food to my Sprint account which was amazing! They unfortunately took that ability away so I literally have no reason to use this app anymore.

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Brandon, we apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with Sprint billing. For now, we recommend attaching another form of payment to your account until the issue is resolved. Thank you for your patience in the matter, and please let us know if we can assist further by writing into support@thelevelup.com at any time.

author: Elisha Mcmahon
comment: Very easy to use

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Elisha, thank you for the review! We're glad you're enjoying your app. Please feel free to reach out to us with questions at any time!

author: A Google User
comment: 1/24/18 Edit - Still a great app but would strongly recommend giving users the ability to cycle through their preferred payment method.  I was only allowed to have one card saved on file.  Minor inconvenience.

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Hi there, thanks for your feedback! We have forwarded this over to the appropriate team for review. If you have other suggestions for us, please write in to support@thelevelup.com so that our team can assist you!

author: Cornelius Coachman
comment: If you're looking to use the Sprint billing option, don't sign up. LevelUp has known about this "issue" for over a year now without a fix in sight. I'm of the opinion that they disabled Sprint because they were losing money. You're better off just using your credit card.

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Cornelius, we apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with Sprint billing. For now, we recommend attaching another form of payment to your account until the issue is resolved. Thank you for your patience in the matter, and please let us know if we can assist further by writing into support@thelevelup.com at any time.

author: Ellen Yee
comment: STILL crashes when I try to open it. NO RESPONSE TO REPORTS. It's been several months now. I GIVE UP!

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Ellen, we're so sorry for the trouble! Please give our support team a call at 855-538-3542 so that this error can be forwarded to the appropriate team, and resolved for you as quickly as possible. Thank you for your continued patience.

author: Tony Jordan
comment: It works well for what I use it for - the cafeteria and sundry shop at my office.

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your review, Tony! We're happy you're enjoying the app. Please let us know if we can ever be of assistance!

author: Marcos Araujo
comment: Works well. And I get an occasional discount

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Marcos, thanks for the great feedback! We're glad you're enjoying using the app. Please feel free to let us know if we can assist in any way at support@thelevelup.com

author: Alex Wang
comment: Definitely makes life easier and my food a bit cheaper

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your review, Alex! We're happy you're enjoying the app. Please let us know if we can ever be of assistance!

author: Anne Gwin
comment: Convenient, with fantastic customer service.

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Anne, thanks for your review! We're so glad you're enjoying the app and customer service. Please let us know if we can be of help at any time!

author: anup shah
comment: Placing an order is quick but customer support is ZERO. Removing and item feom order does not work at all. I reported an issue via app about the incorrect order because app did not remove item and charged my card full amount. After reporting issue it has been 3 week i have not heard anything  from  customer service. I went to store and they mentioned they will sort it out but nothing yet.

author: Eddie Duchatelier
comment: Two times I have had to create and account and it was closed.  Then the support email does not respond to my issue!  Can't figure out the deal with them!

author: cynthia monteiro
comment: So far, so good. Use at cafe at work, plus favorite pizza and sandwich shops. Never had a problem with charges so nothing to complain about. Keeping eye out for more places to use

author: Teresa Stcyr
comment: Disappointed in customer service. I emailed support and reported a bug through the app, and neither sends me a confirmation email saying they received my inquiry. There should be a separate department for people trying to get a refund as that should take priority. I'm an impatient person and a confirmation email would put my mind at ease to an extent, but if I don't hear from LevelUp in by the end of the week I'm just going to call my bank and claim incompetence for a charge back.

author: Robert Landi
comment: Unable to set time for order pickup when ordering ahead (automatically set for "Now"). Also, removing incorrect or prior set orders is a big pain in the you know what.

author: Shoshana Schwartz
comment: I put in an order and got a confirmation.  The order was using beta testing credit and then I payed the balance with my credit card.  When I went to pick up my order, the restaurant said I hadn't paid.  They had received a fax from BeyondMenu saying I had to pay at the restaurant (even though my order was placed through LevelUp and I have never had an account with BeyondMenu).          I called LevelUp support, and they could not resolve the issue to my satisfaction as they wanted to send an email to the restaurant confirming that I had paid, but the restaurant only accepts faxes.  The restaurant also said they didn't have any account with LevelUp and hadn't heard if it, and that my order displayed as from BeyondMenu not LevelUp.  It seems like there are still a lot of glitches to work out, and I am not sure what the relationship between LevelUp and BeyondMenu is.           Note: The customer service lady who answered the phone at LevelUp was very nice, polite, and professional.  It didn't seem like the company gave her much authority to actually resolve the issues though.       Overall, it seems like the benefit is that you can have your order ready and paid for in advance so you can just grab-and-go.  However, it ended up taking me longer than if I'd ordered without the app due to the afoeentioned issues, and was also a very awkward sitaution.          This experience was part of the beta testing, so I understand that the app hasn't been perfected yet.   I think it has potential, but that I would wait to see that the issues have been resolved before trying it again.

author: Maynard Dodson
comment: Not really impressed. I was supposed to receive a $5 credit for signing up, which never materialized.  I don't see any discounts to be had. What's the advantage to just swiping my credit card?

author: Lexi sam
comment: My account got deleted for no reason or explanation as to why. I did get the deal but afterwards couldn't log back into my account.

author: luke ramirez
comment: I keep getting errors when trying to link my sprint account.

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: We apologize for the trouble and delay! We are aware of the Sprint/LevelUp issue you've mentioned, and unfortunately at this time, we're unable to provide a timeline on when this will be corrected. We strongly encourage app users to link an alternate payment method so that they may transact while the problem persists.

author: Mia Bostic
comment: Wish I could still connect to my Sprint account but unfortunately that feature is no longer available.

author: eric dixon
comment: Doesn't work can't link my sprint account

author: Mark Kamoski
comment: Great app but cannot move to sdcard so 4 not 5 stars.

author: Kanishk Singh
comment: It's 2017 and they still don't have Android pay or fingerprint support.

author: A Google User
comment: Easy to use. Nice reward if there were any places that took it. Very few places near me.

author: Brandon Hembrough
comment: Can't link to Sprint bill for some reason.

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for reaching out, and we apologize for the trouble! We are aware of the Sprint/LevelUp issue you've mentioned, and unfortunately at this time, we're unable to provide a timeline on when this will be corrected. We strongly encourage app users to link an alternate payment method so that they may transact while the problem persists.

comment: I think it's awesome  only used to pay so far so good.

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your review! We're happy you're enjoying the app. Please let us know if we can ever be of assistance!

author: A Google User
comment: Very easy way to pay (for places that accept it)

author: Frank Leone
comment: It's an easy and fast way to pay for everything

author: Kiernan Gulick-Sherrill
comment: Works well. Fast and easy.

author: Jeff Jones
comment: Really like the app.

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your review, Jeff! We're happy you're enjoying the app. Please let us know if we can ever be of assistance!

author: Aranique Becnel
comment: I love it

author: Paul Cheon
comment: Nice rewards

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your review, Paul! We're happy you're enjoying the app. Please let us know if we can ever be of assistance!

author: Brendan Lazarus
comment: Material design! Also why did we lose the 5% tip option, too low?

author: MzD Maloy
comment: I tried to cancel an order i placed and it was impossible to get my credits put back on to my global credits. Then on another device i never got the $10 credit so i tried using the $5 off Quiznos and that didnt work either. Bummer. Didnt know how to contact their Zendesk so i just deleted it

author: Jason Ross
comment: LevelUp used to charge once a month, which made for easy bookkeeping. Now they charge immediately, which makes for horrendously tedious bookkeeping. Email to support says this was done for my benefit. The only reason I keep this around is that it's the preferred way to pay for lunch at my workplace. Other than that, I've got no use for this app. I'd even be happy to pre pay since I know about what I spend every month, but that's also not an option.

author: Daniel Cookson
comment: A real time saver, but several of my favorite vendors stopped offering it in the past year due to issues they have with it.  This is just a few blocks from the LevelUp office.  Pay attention to support!

author: J Mark
comment: Used to be great but suddenly my sprint pay option disappeared. Now it's been months and it still doesn't work. Emails to company support were no help.

author: Jason Alonso
comment: The Android Wear integration went away is a stunningly great feature for the hands-limited parent of a small child! (Thanks for bringing it back / unhiding it!)

reply.author: LevelUp, Inc.
reply.content:
Jason-

Thank you for providing this feedback! We are continuously looking into new integrations for the app for future use, and we'll be sure to pass this feedback along to the correct department. If you have other questions or concerns please feel free to write into support@thelevelup.com

comment: Garbage....these scumbags will mess with your payment settings without your knowledge or consent!!!! I had my Steak n Shake account connected to my Sprint account, but when I added a credit card for a DIFFERENT RESTAURANT, Potbelly.....they changed my Steak n Shake payment settings as well. I was charged almost $9 to my credit card instead of Sprint billing. These assholes STILL HAVEN'T REFUNDED MY MONEY! SCREW LEVEL UP AND ALL THEIR RUDE EMPLOYEES!!

author: Steve S
comment: Used app to preorder and pick up. The restaurant said they did not have my order and the app said it charged my credit card. Not a good experience.

author: Joseph Pagliuca III
comment: I don't wait in line anymore.  I love ordering ahead at places near my work and now I have more time to eat and relax then wait.
